name: White nightmares (VoltDon Studio)
description:
First,

This is a game I made for three weeks

This is a little project for my summer learning to code, if you feel like it, please support me by donating

I am planning to release the mobile version and develop some more games

Models by Shedmon on sketchfab

Sounds from mixkit.co and freesound.org 

The maps and programming are by me and with the help of TNTGame

Story :

After you pick up an amulet on the street, you take it home and accidentally break it. Now, the 5 demons have escaped from the amulet's seal and they have confined you in an unending nightmare. Your mission is to find the 5 fragments and find the key out of their maze

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Left Click: Interact

Left Shift: Run

Warning: this game uses white as the main theme, so it may cause some people to experience hallucinations, dizziness, nausea, or headache. Recommended not to play for too long!

P/s: I haven't made the ending scene yet so this game will have an update in future

v1.1: has added an ending scene

If you record your gameplay and post it on YouTube, please post the video link below the comments. Feel free to comment
